greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Index positions of the points of a counterclockwise square spiral as described by A174344 and A274923 in a list of points with integer coordinates with primary sorting by radius and secondary sorting by polar angle as given by A305575 and A305576.
comment: The sequence is a permutation of the integers.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) /* It is assumed that the files a305575 and a305576 contain the second column of the corresponding b-files omitting the initial 0 */
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, May 11 2019
